button.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary col-xs-12 col-md-3 mt16 #{not question.can_answer and 'karma_required' or ''}

p.b: El mensaje se ha cerrado por el motivo:

a.title: Archivar
a.t-attf-class: archive_question no-decoration fa fa-2x fa-archive #{question.user_favourite and 'forum_favourite_question' or ''}
fa fa-comment-o #{not question.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}
accept_answer fa fa-2x fa-check-circle no-decoration #{answer.is_correct and 'oe_answer_true' or 'oe_answer_false'} #{not answer.can_accept and 'karma_required' or ''}
fa fa-comment-o #{not answer.can_comment and 'karma_required text-muted' or ''}

div.i: (solo se permite una respuesta por pregunta)

div.p: Si cierras una pregunta, está se ocultará. Solo los administradores podrán seguir viéndola.

div.t-attf-class: sevigal-message-row clearfix col-md-12 {{question.views == 0 and 'bg-warning sevigal-message-row-unread' or ''}}

span.t-attf-class: pull-right badge #{tag and tag.name == question_tag.name and 'badge-active' ''}

t.h1: No se han encontrado facturas antiguas

button.t-attf-class: btn btn-primary col-xs-12 col-md-2 #{(user.karma < forum.karma_ask) and 'karma_required' or ''}
